name: Switcheroo (itch) (Prologi)
description:
Basicly, every 10 seconds either your shoot side or game view mirrors. Your goal is to beat the final boss, a 20-sided dice that belongs to an evil mage who turned you into a hexagon.

To be honest, I’ve just made something that lived in my mind for some time. The theme fits genre and mechanics so well. It’s pretty confusing to figure out your controls and orientation when the rules are constantly changing every 10 seconds.

Hope you’ll enjoy it.

Good luck!
